resumeSections.summary: Dedicated Software Engineer and Cloud/DevOps practitioner with comprehensive experience in cloud-native architectures, CI/CD practices, and Infrastructure as Code. Proven ability to leverage diverse tech stacks and tools, delivering scalable and secure solutions while thriving in agile, cross-functional environments.

achievements: Designed an end-to-end project-resource planning solution with agile methodology, improving deployment speed by 30%.
Leveraged Kafka for asynchronous communication and integrated React (TypeScript) + Redux for responsive front-end experiences, enhancing user engagement.
Demonstrated proficiency in building and deploying containerized applications using Docker and Terraform, streamlining DevOps processes.
Contributed to the development of an insurance claims portal utilizing .NET Core 6, ReactJS, and various Azure tools, resulting in improved claims processing efficiency.
Championed automated CI/CD pipelines via Azure DevOps, achieving 40% faster deployment cycles.
Created Infrastructure as Code templates (ARM, Bicep, Terraform) ensuring consistent resource provisioning across environments, enhancing environment stability.
Gained hands-on experience with Java, Spring Boot, Angular, and AWS, contributing to the development of an internal employee platform.
Applied agile methodologies effectively through active participation in Scrum processes, enhancing team collaboration and project outcomes.
Designed and built a cross-platform mobile app teaching sustainable aquaponics, positively impacting local communities by promoting eco-friendly practices.
Utilized ASP.NET Core for backend design, ensuring a robust and scalable application architecture.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

technical: C#, Java (up to Java 17), Python, TypeScript
.NET Core (6), Spring Boot, Quarkus, ReactJS, Redux, Angular
ASP.NET Core, Hibernate/JPA, MongoDB, Microsoft SQL Server, Azure Cosmos DB
Jenkins, Azure DevOps, GitOps (FluxCD), JFrog Artifactory
Microsoft Azure, AWS (EKS, EC2, S3, RDS), Google Cloud Platform
Terraform, Bicep, ARM Templates, YAML-based pipeline definitions

certifications.name: Databricks Academy Accreditation – Generative AI Fundamentals

Led team projects that presented innovative solutions to real-world problems during academic tenure.
